title: Ten years in an open necked shirt
creator_credit: Nick May, Peter Berry, Elizabeth Taylor-Mead, Channel Four, Arts Council of Great Britain and Metropolis Pictures
brief_description: John Cooper Clarke - poet, storyteller, comic, is the central figure of the contemporary British revival of popular poetry. This program which mixes concert footage and interviews with interpreted and dramatised treatments of his work, shows him to be as engaging and extraordinary as the imagery of his poetry.
